description: This table contains inpatient adjudication information from the Remittance Image.

columns.name: IMAGE_ID
columns.description: This is the ID for the remittance image record with inpatient adjudication information.

columns.name: COVERED_DAYS
columns.description: Covered days or visit count for the claim for inpatient adjudication information.

columns.name: PPS_OPER_OUTL_AMT
columns.description: Prospective payment system operating outlier amount for inpatient adjudication information.

columns.name: LIFETIME_PSYC_DAYS
columns.description: Lifetime psychiatric days count for inpatient adjudication information.

columns.name: CLAIM_DRG_AMT
columns.description: Monetary amount for the diagnosis related group for inpatient adjudication information.

columns.name: REMARK_CODE_1
columns.description: Remark code 1 for inpatient adjudication info.

columns.name: CLM_DISP_SHAR_AMT
columns.description: Monetary amount for the claim disproportionate share for inpatient adjudication information.

columns.name: CLAIM_MSP_PASS_AMT
columns.description: Monetary amount for the claim Medicare secondary payor pass through for inpatient adjudication information.

columns.name: CLAIM_PPS_CAP_AMT
columns.description: Monetary amount for the prospective payment system capital for inpatient adjudication information.

columns.name: PPSCAP_FSP_DRG_AMT
columns.description: Monetary amount for the prospective payment system's capital federal-specific portion for the diagnosis-related group for inpatient adjudication information.

columns.name: PPSCAP_HSP_DRG_AMT
columns.description: Monetary amount for the prospective payment system's capital hospital-specific portion for the diagnosis-related group for inpatient adjudication information.

columns.name: PPS_DSH_DRG_AMT
columns.description: Monetary amount for the prospective payment system's capital disproportionate share diagnosis related group for inpatient adjudication information.

columns.name: OLD_CAPITAL_AMT
columns.description: Monetary amount of old capital for inpatient adjudication information.

columns.name: PPS_CAPTL_IME_AMT
columns.description: Monetary amount for the prospective payment system capital's indirect medical education for inpatient adjudication information.

columns.name: PPS_OP_HSP_DRG_AMT
columns.description: Monetary amount for the prospective payment system's operating hospital's specific diagnosis related group for inpatient adjudication information.

columns.name: COST_REPORT_DAYS
columns.description: The number of days that may be claimed as Medicare patient days on a cost report for inpatient adjudication information.

columns.name: PPS_FED_DRG_AMT
columns.description: Monetary amount for the prospective payment system's operating federal specific diagnosis related group for inpatient adjudication information.

columns.name: CLAIM_PPS_CAPT_AMT
columns.description: Monetary amount for the prospective payment system's capital outlier for inpatient adjudication information.

columns.name: CLAIM_INDR_TCH_AMT
columns.description: The monetary amount for the claim indirect teaching amount for inpatient adjudication information.

columns.name: NONPY_PROF_COM_AMT
columns.description: The monetary amount for the nonpayable professional component for inpatient adjudication information.

columns.name: REMARK_CODE_2
columns.description: Remark code 2 for inpatient adjudication info.

columns.name: REMARK_CODE_3
columns.description: Remark code 3 for inpatient adjudication info.

columns.name: REMARK_CODE_4
columns.description: Remark code 4 for inpatient adjudication info.

columns.name: REMARK_CODE_5
columns.description: Remark code 5 for inpatient adjudication info.

columns.name: PPS_EXCEPTION_AMT
columns.description: Monetary amount for the prospective payment system's capital exception for inpatient adjudication information.
